field.name: quality
field.label: Image quality
field.description: This value will be effected on new generated images only.

field.name: scaleMethod
field.label: Type of scaling
field.description: Define which type of scaling should be used. Default: SCALE_INSIDE

field.name: scaleUp
field.label: Allow scaling up
field.description: Smaller images will be scaled up to the needed resolution

field.name: cleanup
field.label: Cleanup on uninstall
field.description: Set to YES if the uninstall process should delete the generated files when you uninstall this plug in
